2: <pb/><t>A Dios ay yikbej, moj chon xiw bay; a' chi ak'on ayjok ec' junc'ulal bay satcan.</t>
3: <t>A eb yejército Cham c'amxa chi bischaj eb, a is tzektebal chi tzektanen masanil.</t>
4: <t>Tokwal ay junok anima tol c'am is mul satak Dios. Tok ay mac tojol yayji.</t>
5: <t>A yul sat Cham, a xajaw tu' c'am wal is jopopial, tamwal tol caw wal watx'xac'al waycan tu',</t>
6: <t>akxam wal eb anima, tol lajanc'al eb axca no patz, ẍi cham Bildad.</t>
